description: This file is a PHP web page for adding a blocked service in a parental control management system. It includes PHP scripts for header inclusion, inline JavaScript for form validation and AJAX submission, and HTML form elements for user input.

methods.name: updateBlockTimeVisibility
methods.description: Updates the visibility and enabled state of the block time input fields based on the 'Always Block' switch.

methods.name: $(document).ready(function() { ... })
methods.description: Initializes event handlers and validation rules once the DOM is fully loaded.
